com.stickycoding.Rokon
Class Text

java.lang.Object
  com.stickycoding.Rokon.Text

public class Text
extends java.lang.Object

Text is an object which can be added to Layer's that will draw text using TTF fonts loaded into the Font class. Essentially, each letter is drawn as its own Sprite, and textured independantly. For this reason, Text should be used for frequently changing text (such as game score's) Another library is planned which will be optimized for longer or non-changing text, using fixed textures.

Author:
Richard
